Function for info about current R session

session_info.Rd

Function for info about current R session

Usage

session_info(
  r_version = getRversion(),
  system = osVersion,
  user = Sys.getenv("USERNAME"),
  machine = Sys.getenv("COMPUTERNAME"),
  time = format(Sys.time(), "%Y/%m/%d - %X"),
  libs = .libPaths(),
  env_obj = ls(all.names = T, envir = globalenv()),
  header = paste0("\n", paste0(rep("=", 60), collapse = ""), "\n"),
  limit = 12
)

Examples

session_info()
#> 
#> ============================================================
#> R Version: 4.4.1
#> System:    Windows 10 x64 (build 19045)
#> User:      luisg
#> Machine:   DESKTOP-R383IKG
#> Time:      2024/09/19 - 23:55:47
#> ============================================================
#> Libraries:
#> 	C:/Users/luisg/AppData/Local/Temp/Rtmpo1kIFY/temp_libpath282c7ebd6657
#> 	C:/Users/luisg/AppData/Local/R/win-library/4.4
#> 	C:/Program Files/R/R-4.4.1/library
#> ============================================================
#> Global Env Objects:
#> 	.Random.seed
#> ============================================================
#>
